page.title: 02Hobbies of Neil Amos
page.content: I enjoy playing snooker and pool. They are my best sports and enjoyment, followed by drawing and modern music and long walks. My Mum enjoys drawing hard pictures and reading books and doing puzzles (She can do the Rubic cube in three minutes). My Dad enjoys sitting down with the newspaper but he also rides a bike and he likes playing snooker with me. I have a sports centre round the corner to me that is very handy to go to. I also watch a lot of television and so do all the rest of my family. But I am the most interested in the television. I calculated that I watch about 21 hours of television a week which on average works out to about 3 hours a day. My friend Steven enjoys all sports too, especially swimming and football. He watches the same amount of television as me, so do most people in the class.
